code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{getCart,removeFromCart}from"../utils/cart";import"../styles/cart.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Cart(){const[items,setItems]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{setItems(getCart());},[]);const removeItem=id=>{removeFromCart(id);setItems(getCart());};const totalCost=items.reduce((sum,item)=>sum+Number(item.price),0);const buyProducts=()=>{if(items.length===0){alert("Cart is empty");return;}alert("Proceeding to buy products worth \u20B9".concat(totalCost));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Your Cart"}),items.length===0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"empty",children:"Cart is empty"}),items.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-layout",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-items",children:items.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"price",children:["\u20B9",item.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"remove-btn",onClick:()=>removeItem(item._id||item.name),children:"Remove"})]})]},item._id||item.name))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-summary",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Order Summary"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Items ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:items.length})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Total ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["\u20B9",totalCost]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"checkout-btn",onClick:buyProducts,children:"Buy Products"})]})]})]});}
